name: The Beach Tower Okinawa

reviews.text: Its not a luxury beach resort, but travelers/vacationers looking for value in Japan would be pleased at The Beach Tower Okinawa.
reviews.title: Great Value at Chatan/American Village

reviews.text: Located at "American Village," Chatan, the hotel fronts the man made beach "Sunset Beach." The beach is protected for easy swimming, and the west facing direction ensures daily sunsets to watch.
reviews.title: DO NOT STAY HERE.........

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: American Village includes a number of dining, shopping, and entertainment options, so there are many attractions within easy walking distance. The hotel also operates an onsen hot bath just next to the lobby, which is free to hotel guests.
reviews.title: This hotel really made Okinawa for me!

aka: The Beach Tower Okinawa Hotel Chatan-Cho
